revised_title: Development of a Sensitive Micro-Balance and Its Application in Detecting Radioactive Substances
tldr: The authors develop a sensitive micro-balance capable of measuring minute weight changes, with applications in detecting and measuring the weight loss of radioactive substances like radium bromide. They construct two types of micro-balances, one for measuring small alterations in weight and another for absolute weight determinations, both with high levels of accuracy and sensitiveness.
